contentrichtext.text: '''This page is an archive of the discussion surrounding the proposed deletion of the page entitled [[<page name>]].''' '''This page is kept as an historic record.''' '''The result of the debate was to delete the article.''' ---- Vanity. [[User:RickK|Rick]]'''[[User talk:RickK|K''']] 04:26, 9 May 2004 (UTC) * + an attempt to drive up traffic at his website. '''delete'''. --[[User:Bodnotbod|bodnotbod]] 15:13, May 9, 2004 (UTC) *Not vanity. Keep. [[User:Anthony DiPierro|anthony]] [[User:Anthony_DiPierro/warning|(see warning)]] 15:54, 9 May 2004 (UTC) *Comment: He gets a fair number of Google hits that aren't from his own web site. Are we sure this is vanity? A CEO of a notable company deserves an article. [[User:Everyking|Everyking]] 17:50, 9 May 2004 (UTC) *Delete. I tried googling for his company "Anandas Consulting". It's an "e-business consulting firm in Toronto", only 95 google hits and it is not clear if the company still exists (its website does not exist). In one sentence, it is not a notable company. So, I vote delete. [[User:Andris|Andris]] 21:03, May 9, 2004 (UTC) ---- This page is now preserved as an archive of the debate and is no longer 'live'. Subsequent comments on the issue or the deletion should be placed on other relevant 'live' pages. '''Please do not edit this page.''' ----
